verses.verse: הָעִ֣זוּ ׀ <WH5756> gather yourselves to flee בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> O ye children בִניָמִ֗ן <WH1144> of Benjamin מִקֶּ֙רֶב֙ <WH7130> out of the midst יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem וּבִתְק֙וֹעַ֙ <WH8620> in Tekoa תִּקְע֣וּ <WH8628> and blow שׁוֹפָ֔ר <WH7782> the trumpet וְעַל־ <WH5921> over בֵּ֥ית הַכֶּ֖רֶם <WH1021> of fire in Bethhaccerem שְׂא֣וּ <WH5375> and set up מַשְׂאֵ֑ת <WH4864> a sign כִּ֥י <WH3588> for רָעָ֛ה <WH7451> for evil נִשְׁקְפָ֥ה <WH8259> appeareth מִצָּפ֖וֹן <WH6828> out of the north וְשֶׁ֥בֶר <WH7667> destruction גָּדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> and great
הַנָּוָה֙ <WH5000> the comely וְהַמְּעֻנָּגָ֔ה <WH6026> and delicate דָּמִ֖יתִי <WH1819> compare בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter צִיּֽוֹן׃ <WH6726> of Zion

אֵלֶ֛יהָ <WH413> about יָבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> shall come רֹעִ֖ים <WH7462> The shepherds וְעֶדְרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5739> with their flocks תָּקְע֨וּ <WH8628> unto her they shall pitch עָלֶ֤יהָ <WH5921> and אֹהָלִים֙ <WH168> [their] tents סָבִ֔יב <WH5439> against her round about רָע֖וּ <WH7462> they shall feed אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every one אֶת־ <WH853> יָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> in his place

קַדְּשׁ֤וּ <WH6942> Prepare עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5921> against מִלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> ye war ק֖וּמוּ <WH6965> against her arise וְנַעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> and let us go up בַֽצָּהֳרָ֑יִם <WH6672> at noon א֥וֹי <WH188> Woe לָ֙נוּ֙ כִּי־ <WH3588> for פָנָ֣ה <WH6437> goeth away הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> unto us for the day כִּ֥י <WH3588> for יִנָּט֖וּ <WH5186> are stretched out צִלְלֵי־ <WH6752> for the shadows עָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> of the evening
ק֚וּמוּ <WH6965> Arise וְנַעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> and let us go בַלָּ֔יְלָה <WH3915> by night וְנַשְׁחִ֖יתָה <WH7843> and let us destroy אַרְמְנוֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH759> her palaces ס

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֹ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> said יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> For thus hath the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts כִּרְת֣וּ <WH3772> Hew ye down עֵצָ֔ה <WH6097> trees וְשִׁפְכ֥וּ <WH8210> and cast עַל־ <WH5921> against יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> against Jerusalem סֹלְלָ֑ה <WH5550> a mount הִ֚יא <WH1931> This הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> this [is] the city הָפְקַ֔ד <WH6485> to be visited כֻּלָּ֖הּ <WH3605> is only עֹ֥שֶׁק <WH6233> she [is] wholly oppression בְּקִרְבָּֽהּ׃ <WH7130> in the midst

כְּהָקִ֥יר <WH6979> casteth out [בְּוֵר כ] (בַּ֙יִר֙ <WH953> cistern ק) מֵימֶ֔יהָ <WH4325> her waters כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> So הֵקֵ֣רָה <WH6979> so she casteth out רָעָתָ֑הּ <WH7451> her wickedness חָמָ֣ס <WH2555> violence וָ֠שֹׁד <WH7701> and spoil יִשָּׁ֨מַע <WH8085> is heard בָּ֧הּ עַל־ <WH5921> her before פָּנַ֛י <WH6440> in her before me תָּמִ֖יד <WH8548> continually חֳלִ֥י <WH2483> [is] grief וּמַכָּֽה׃ <WH4347> and wounds

הִוָּסְרִי֙ <WH3256> Be thou instructed יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> O Jerusalem פֶּן־ <WH6435> Or תֵּקַ֥ע <WH3363> depart נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> lest my soul מִמֵּ֑ךְ <WH4480> at פֶּן־ <WH6435> Or אֲשִׂימֵ֣ךְ <WH7760> from thee lest I make שְׁמָמָ֔ה <WH8077> thee desolate אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> a land ל֥וֹא <WH3808> not נוֹשָֽׁבָה׃ <WH3427> not inhabited פ

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith יְהֹוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts עוֹלֵ֛ל <WH5953> They shall throughly יְעוֹלְל֥וּ <WH5953> glean כַגֶּ֖פֶן <WH1612> as a vine שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> the remnant יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel הָשֵׁב֙ <WH7725> turn back יָדְךָ֔ <WH3027> thine hand כְּבוֹצֵ֖ר <WH1219> as a grapegatherer עַל־ <WH5921> Over סַלְסִלּֽוֹת׃ <WH5552> into the baskets

עַל־ <WH5921> unto מִ֨י <WH4310> whom אֲדַבְּרָ֤ה <WH1696> To whom shall I speak וְאָעִ֙ידָה֙ <WH5749> and give warning וְיִשְׁמָ֔עוּ <WH8085> that they may hear הִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> Behold עֲרֵלָ֣ה <WH6189> [is] uncircumcised אָזְנָ֔ם <WH241> ? behold their ear וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> no יוּכְל֖וּ <WH3201> and they cannot לְהַקְשִׁ֑יב <WH7181> hearken הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold דְבַר־ <WH1697> behold the word יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> has become לָהֶ֛ם לְחֶרְפָּ֖ה <WH2781> is unto them a reproach לֹ֥א <WH3808> no יַחְפְּצוּ־ <WH2654> they have no delight בֽוֹ׃

וְאֵת֩ <WH854> for חֲמַ֨ת <WH2534> of the fury יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> of the LORD מָלֵ֙אתִי֙ <WH4392> Therefore I am full נִלְאֵ֣יתִי <WH3811> I am weary הָכִ֔יל <WH3557> with holding in שְׁפֹ֤ךְ <WH8210> I will pour it out עַל־ <WH5921> on עוֹלָל֙ <WH5768> upon the children בַּח֔וּץ <WH2351> abroad וְעַ֛ל <WH5921> and on ס֥וֹד <WH5475> and upon the assembly בַּחוּרִ֖ים <WH970> of young men יַחְדָּ֑ו <WH3162> together כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For גַם־ <WH1571> both אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> for even the husband עִם־ <WH5973> with אִשָּׁה֙ <WH802> with the wife יִלָּכֵ֔דוּ <WH3920> shall be taken זָקֵ֖ן <WH2205> the aged עִם־ <WH5973> But מְלֵ֥א <WH4390> with [him that is] full יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> of days

וְנָסַ֤בּוּ <WH5437> shall be turned בָֽתֵּיהֶם֙ <WH1004> And their houses לַאֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> unto others שָׂד֥וֹת <WH7704> [with their] fields וְנָשִׁ֖ים <WH802> and wives יַחְדָּ֑ו <WH3162> together כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַטֶּ֧ה <WH5186> for I will stretch out אֶת־ <WH853> יָדִ֛י <WH3027> my hand עַל־ <WH5921> Against יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> upon the inhabitants הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the land נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

כִּ֤י <WH3588> from מִקְּטַנָּם֙ <WH6996> For from the least וְעַד־ <WH5704> even גְּדוֹלָ֔ם <WH1419> of them even unto the greatest כֻּלּ֖וֹ <WH3605> Everyone בּוֹצֵ֣עַ <WH1214> of them every one [is] given בָּ֑צַע <WH1215> to covetousness וּמִנָּבִיא֙ <WH5030> and from the prophet וְעַד־ <WH5704> even כֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> even unto the priest כֻּלּ֖וֹ <WH3605> Everyone עֹ֥שֶׂה <WH6213> every one dealeth שָּֽׁקֶר׃ <WH8267> falsely

וַֽיְרַפְּא֞וּ <WH7495> They have healed אֶת־ <WH853> שֶׁ֤בֶר <WH7667> also the hurt עַמִּי֙ <WH5971> ] of my people עַל־ <WH5921> and נְקַלָּ֔ה <WH7043> slightly לֵאמֹ֖ר <WH559> saying שָׁל֣וֹם ׀ <WH7965> Peace שָׁל֑וֹם <WH7965> peace וְאֵ֖ין <WH369> is no שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> when [there is] no peace

הֹבִ֕ישׁוּ <WH3001> Were they ashamed כִּ֥י <WH3588> because תוֹעֵבָ֖ה <WH8441> of the abomination עָשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> when they had committed גַּם־ <WH1571> neither בּ֣וֹשׁ <WH954> they were not at all לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יֵב֗וֹשׁוּ <WH954> ashamed גַּם־ <WH1571> even הַכְלִים֙ <WH3637> they blush לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יָדָ֔עוּ <WH3045> could לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore יִפְּל֧וּ <WH5307> therefore they shall fall בַנֹּפְלִ֛ים <WH5307> among them that fall בְּעֵת־ <WH6256> at the time פְּקַדְתִּ֥ים <WH6485> [that] I visit יִכָּשְׁל֖וּ <WH3782> them they shall be cast down אָמַ֥ר <WH559> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

כֹּ֣ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֡ה <WH3068> the LORD עִמְדוּ֩ <WH5975> Stand עַל־ <WH5921> by דְּרָכִ֨ים <WH1870> ye in the ways וּרְא֜וּ <WH7200> and see וְשַׁאֲל֣וּ ׀ <WH7592> and ask לִנְתִב֣וֹת <WH5410> paths עוֹלָ֗ם <WH5769> for the old אֵי־ <WH335> Where זֶ֨ה <WH2088> he דֶ֤רֶךְ <WH1870> way הַטּוֹב֙ <WH2896> where [is] the good וּלְכוּ־ <WH1980> is and walk בָ֔הּ וּמִצְא֥וּ <WH4672> therein and ye shall find מַרְגּ֖וֹעַ <WH4771> rest לְנַפְשְׁכֶ֑ם <WH5315> for your souls וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> But they said לֹ֥א <WH3808> We will not נֵלֵֽךְ׃ <WH1980> walk

וַהֲקִמֹתִ֤י <WH6965> Also I set עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <WH5921> over צֹפִ֔ים <WH6822> watchmen הַקְשִׁ֖יבוּ <WH7181> over you [saying] Hearken לְק֣וֹל <WH6963> to the sound שׁוֹפָ֑ר <WH7782> of the trumpet וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> But they said לֹ֥א <WH3808> not נַקְשִֽׁיב׃ <WH7181> We will not hearken
לָכֵ֖ן <WH3651> Therefore שִׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> Therefore hear הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> ye nations וּדְעִ֥י <WH3045> and know עֵדָ֖ה <WH5712> O congregation אֶת־ <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what בָּֽם׃

שִׁמְעִ֣י <WH8085> Hear הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> O earth הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> behold אָנֹכִ֜י <WH595> I מֵבִ֥יא <WH935> behold I will bring רָעָ֛ה <WH7451> evil אֶל־ <WH413> about הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> upon this people הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this פְּרִ֣י <WH6529> [even] the fruit מַחְשְׁבוֹתָ֑ם <WH4284> of their thoughts כִּ֤י <WH3588> for עַל־ <WH5921> unto דְּבָרַי֙ <WH1697> unto my words לֹ֣א <WH3808> have not הִקְשִׁ֔יבוּ <WH7181> because they have not hearkened וְתוֹרָתִ֖י <WH8451> nor to my law וַיִּמְאֲסוּ־ <WH3988> but rejected בָֽהּ׃

לָמָּה־ <WH4100> what זֶּ֨ה <WH2088> purpose לִ֤י לְבוֹנָה֙ <WH3828> there to me incense מִשְּׁבָ֣א <WH7614> from Sheba תָב֔וֹא <WH935> To what purpose cometh וְקָנֶ֥ה <WH7070> cane הַטּ֖וֹב <WH2896> and the sweet מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> from מֶרְחָ֑ק <WH4801> from a far עֹלֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <WH5930> offerings לֹ֣א <WH3808> are not לְרָצ֔וֹן <WH7522> [are] not acceptable וְזִבְחֵיכֶ֖ם <WH2077> nor your sacrifices לֹא־ <WH3808> are not עָ֥רְבוּ <WH6149> sweet לִֽי׃ ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> behold נֹתֵ֛ן <WH5414> Behold I will lay אֶל־ <WH413> before הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> before this people הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this מִכְשֹׁלִ֑ים <WH4383> stumblingblocks וְכָ֣שְׁלוּ <WH3782> shall fall בָ֠ם אָב֨וֹת <WH1> and the fathers וּבָנִ֥ים <WH1121> and the sons יַחְדָּ֛ו <WH3162> together שָׁכֵ֥ן <WH7934> upon them the neighbour וְרֵע֖וֹ <WH7453> and his friend [יֹאבֵדוּ כ] (וְאָבָֽדוּ׃ <WH6> break ק) פ

כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> Behold עַ֥ם <WH5971> Behold a people בָּ֖א <WH935> cometh מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> country צָפ֑וֹן <WH6828> from the north וְג֣וֹי <WH1471> nation גָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> and a great יֵע֖וֹר <WH5782> shall be raised מִיַּרְכְּתֵי־ <WH3411> from the sides אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

קֶ֣שֶׁת <WH7198> on bow וְכִיד֞וֹן <WH3591> and spear יַחֲזִ֗יקוּ <WH2388> They shall lay hold אַכְזָרִ֥י <WH394> they [are] cruel הוּא֙ <WH1931> he וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> no יְרַחֵ֔מוּ <WH7355> and have no mercy קוֹלָם֙ <WH6963> their voice כַּיָּ֣ם <WH3220> like the sea יֶהֱמֶ֔ה <WH1993> roareth וְעַל־ <WH5921> Against סוּסִ֖ים <WH5483> upon horses יִרְכָּ֑בוּ <WH7392> and they ride עָר֗וּךְ <WH6186> set in array כְּאִישׁ֙ <WH376> as men לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> for war עָלַ֖יִךְ <WH5921> Against בַּת־ <WH1323> against thee O daughter צִיּֽוֹן׃ <WH6726> of Zion

שָׁמַ֥עְנוּ <WH8085> We have heard אֶת־ <WH853> שָׁמְע֖וֹ <WH8089> the fame רָפ֣וּ <WH7503> wax feeble יָדֵ֑ינוּ <WH3027> thereof our hands צָרָה֙ <WH6869> anguish הֶחֱזִיקַ֔תְנוּ <WH2388> hath taken hold חִ֖יל <WH2427> of us [and] pain כַּיּוֹלֵדָֽה׃ <WH3205> as of a woman in travail

אַל־ <WH408> nay [תֵּצְאִי כ] (תֵּֽצְאוּ֙ <WH3318> after ק) הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> into the field וּבַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way אַל־ <WH408> nay [תֵּלֵכִי כ] (תֵּלֵ֑כוּ <WH1980> along ק) כִּ֚י <WH3588> has a חֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> for the sword לְאֹיֵ֔ב <WH341> of the enemy מָג֖וֹר <WH4032> [and] fear מִסָּבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> [is] on every side

בַּת־ <WH1323> O daughter עַמִּ֤י <WH5971> of my people חִגְרִי־ <WH2296> gird שָׂק֙ <WH8242> [thee] with sackcloth וְהִתְפַּלְּשִׁ֣י <WH6428> and wallow בָאֵ֔פֶר <WH665> thyself in ashes אֵ֤בֶל <WH60> thee mourning יָחִיד֙ <WH3173> [as for] an only son עֲשִׂ֣י <WH6213> make לָ֔ךְ מִסְפַּ֖ד <WH4553> lamentation תַּמְרוּרִ֑ים <WH8563> most bitter כִּ֣י <WH3588> For פִתְאֹ֔ם <WH6597> shall suddenly יָבֹ֥א <WH935> come הַשֹּׁדֵ֖ד <WH7703> for the spoiler עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5921> and
